definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)

sentences.english: Whoso curseth his father or his mother, his lamp shall be put out in obscure darkness.
sentences.chinese: 咒骂父母的，他的灯必灭，变为漆黑的黑暗。

sentences.english: That, at the resurrection, our bodies shall be transformed into absolutely ethereal bodies.
sentences.chinese: 复活时，我们的身体将变为绝对虚无缥渺的东西。

sentences.english: He turned the desert into pools of water and the parched ground into flowing springs;
sentences.chinese: 他使旷野变为水潭，叫旱地变为水泉。

sentences.english: He turned the desert into pools of water and the parched ground into flowing springs;
sentences.chinese: 他使旷野变为水潭，叫旱地变为水泉。

sentences.english: After rolling, these inclusions turn from ball-like shape to chain-like and dot-linked shapes.
sentences.chinese: 夹杂形状经轧制后由球形逐渐变为长条形和点链状。

sentences.english: The adjusted increment method can change the trial method of hydraulic calculation into direct calculation.
sentences.chinese: 增量调整法可将水力计算中的试算变为直接计算。

sentences.english: For the Big Three now read the Magnificent Seven.
sentences.chinese: 三大厂商的提法现在变为七强。

sentences.english: Here heat energy transforms to electricity.
The bathroom eliminates contented physiology requirement outside, still be recreational space changeably .
sentences.chinese: 浴室除满足生理需求外，还可变为休闲空间。

sentences.english: The new wine mourneth, the vine languisheth, all the merryhearted do sigh.
sentences.chinese: 新酒悲哀，葡萄树衰残，心中欢乐的，变为叹息。

sentences.english: Also: homescreen navigation is now real-time.
sentences.chinese: 主屏导航现在也变为实时的了。

sentences.english: The sky slowly changed from blue to red.
sentences.chinese: 天外慢慢由蓝色变为赤色。

sentences.english: A larva metamorphoses into a chrysalis and then into a butterfly.
sentences.chinese: 幼虫变为蝶蛹，再变成蝴蝶。

sentences.english: It is great to change foe to friend.
sentences.chinese: 把仇雠变为朋友，这该多好啊。

sentences.english: Zoram'gar Outpost will be a Warsong Hold style base.
sentences.chinese: 佐拉姆加前哨站将会变为一座战歌堡风格的要塞。

sentences.english: Dragon Form: Flame Breath engulfs all units in a cone in front of Shyvana.
sentences.chinese: 处于龙族形态下，烈焰吐息将变为锥形的范围法术。

definition: to change into/to turn into/to become
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
